subject: Football (College)
lead_paragraph: Marshall may be undefeated, but it committed two turnovers and 11 penalties to go with kicking-game blunders in a difficult win on Saturday, which will not help its hopes of playing in a major bowl game.
snippet: Marshall may be undefeated, but it committed two turnovers and 11 penalties to go with kicking-game blunders in a difficult win on Saturday, which will not help its hopes of playing in a major bowl game.
